AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: make it true if you want bot to view status

AUTOLIKE_STATUS.description: Make it true if you want bot to read and like status else leave blank

AUTOLIKE_EMOJI.description: Input your custom status like emoji else leave blank to use default => ðŸ«¨

AUTO_REACT.description: make it true if you want a bot to react on messages

AUTO_REPLY_STATUS.description: make it true if you want the bot to send message after viewing status else leave blank

AUTO_READ.description: make it true if you want bot to read message

AUTO_TYPING.description: make it true if you want bot to show typing

AUTO_RECORDING.description: make it true if you want bot to show recording audio

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: make it true if you want bot to show always online

AUTO_BIO.description: make it true if you want the bot to update de bio after restart

AUTO_BLOCK.description: make it true if you want bot to auto block only 212 numbers

REJECT_CALL.description: make it true if you want to reject call

WELCOME.description: make it true if you want to enable auto welcome

ANTILINK.description: make it true if you want to enable auto delete links
